Info.Title: Happy Turkey Boy
Info.Ability: Once per game, discard your hand to skip your opponents next turn.

Info.Title: Cheese Samurai Matt
Info.Description: Honorbound under his 'sharp' sword, de-'brie's cannot stop the 'monetary' destruction he may cause. He is not a 'gouda' samurai.
Info.Ability: Discard a card with credibility 10 or lower to remove a card from play.

Info.Title: Happy Burger Boy
Info.Ability: Credibility increases by 5 for every 'Pool Party' faction card in play and for every 'Food' card in play.

Info.Title: Happy Burrito Boy
Info.Ability: Once per game skip your next turn to draw three cards

Info.Title: Sharing is Caring
Info.Ability: Every time you draw a 'Gift' card you may immediately play it and draw another card.

Info.Title: Mob Mentality
Info.Description: A term coined by psychology for following the crowd. See reddit.com
Info.Ability: If a 'Propria-Party' location card is in play, increase the credibility of this card by 30

Info.Title: Cheese Head
Info.Description: The legendary head-gear of a cheese samurai!
Info.Ability: The credibility of cards in your hand increases by 5.

Info.Title: Mejier Rotisserie Chicken
Info.Description: The unholy union of ying and yang that may act as a replacement for a spoiled turkey.
Info.Ability: All 'food-based' cards that do not contain this cards faction must be removed from play.

Info.Title: Holiday Homework
Info.Ability: If a 'Cafe' faction location is in play, remove it from play.

Info.Title: Stuffing
Info.Ability: Remove from play to draw a 'Location' card from your deck and then shuffle your deck.

Info.Title: Thanksgiving Dinner
Info.Ability: All cards in play are considered 'Food' cards

Info.Title: Thanksgiving Break
Info.Description: A nice break that taunts you from the real deal.
Info.Ability: Select a faction, this card becomes that faction.

Info.Title: Black Friday
Info.Description: A holiday of remembrance in which morals were massacred by consumeristic ideals.
Info.Ability: Changes the factions of cards in play to 'Propria-Party' and doubles their credibility

Info.Title: White Castle
Info.Description: The antithesis of a 'Thanksgiving' dinner and where despair consumes all. Often delays trips to more important locations. Known for their numerous, really tiny, frozen burgers.
Info.Ability: All food cards in play are doubled. Cannot be removed.

Info.Title: Family Gathering
Info.Description: A place loved and feared by many.
Info.Ability: 'Cafe' faction cards have their credibility increased by 5
